content: चलन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [चल् भावे ल्युट्] Moving, tremulous, trembling, shaking. --नः {@--1@} A foot. {@--2@} A deer. --नं {@--1@} Trembling, shaking or shaking motion; चलनात्मकं कर्म <ls>T. S.</ls>; हस्त°, जानु° &c.; तरलदृगंचलचलनमनोहरवदनजनितरतिरागं <ls>Gīt. 11.</ls> {@--2@} Turning or leaving off. {@--3@} Roaming, wandering. --नी {@--1@} A short petticoat worn by common women. {@--2@} The rope for tying an elephant.
